TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDockProvider

summary.span: 公开一些方法和属性，UI 自动化客户端可通过这些方法和属性来访问在某个停靠容器内公开其停靠属性的控件。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that expose their dock properties within a docking container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 UI 自动化提供程序必须支持上控件模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern. 停靠容器是允许的控件的排列子元素，水平和垂直两个位置相对于停靠容器和容器内的其他元素的边界。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container. 不公开停靠容器的任何属性或可能停靠在停靠容器内当前控件旁边的任何的控件属性。 does not expose any properties of the docking container or any properties of controls that may be docked adjacent to the current control within the docking container. 根据其当前的 z 顺序; 彼此相对停靠控件中的较大其 z 顺序位置进一步位于从停靠容器的指定边缘。Controls are docked relative to each other based on their current z-order; the higher their z-order placement the further they are placed from the specified edge of the docking container.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DockPosition As DockPosition
public: property System::Windows::Automation::DockPosition DockPosition { System::Windows::Automation::DockPosition get(); };

summary.span: 获取控件在停靠容器内的当前 。

span.span: Gets the current of the control within a docking container.

value.span: 控件相对于停靠容器和容器内其他元素的边界的 。

span.span: The of the control, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 停靠容器是允许的控件的排列子元素，水平和垂直两个位置相对于停靠容器和容器内的其他元素的边界。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetDockPosition(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition dockPosition) cil managed

param.name: dockPosition
param.span: 相对于停靠容器边界和容器内的其他元素的停靠位置。

span.span: The dock position, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.

summary.span: 将控件停靠在停靠容器内。

span.span: Docks the control within a docking container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 停靠容器是允许的控件的排列子元素，水平和垂直两个位置相对于停靠容器和容器内的其他元素的边界。A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.
